Room.Name: Rosecrest Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Rosecrest Street, west of the Oceancrest Public Amphitheatre.
Room.LongDescription: The Oceancrest Amphitheatre is more like a large gathering party that occurs daily around dusk. The minstrels and bards entertain the people while they talk and eat dinner after a long day's work. Occasionally, the administration will sponser concerts or other orchestral plays and musicals to increase their waning revenues.
